title: The Sign Around My Neck
description: Eleven-year-old Lu (short for “Lucy”) has grown up surrounded by friends and family who think of him as a girl, but he has a secret that he has only begun to share with himself: Inside, he has always been a boy. Now, with the help of a few good friends, he's ready to take on his parents and all of the kids at school so he can finally be himself. But first, he'll have to get through the fifth grade play!
author: Lucas Hasten
